I’ll go ahead and also note that you can make this work with zero maintenance by doing:

namesapce ignition {
namespace gazebo {
namespace systems {
inline namespace IGNITION_GAZEBO_VERSION_NAMESPACE {

IGNITION_ADD_PLUGIN_ALIAS(iPhysics, "ignition::gazebo::system::Physics", "Physics System", "physics")

} // namespace IGNITION_GAZEBO_VERSION_NAMESPACE
} // namespace systems
} // namespace gazebo
} // namespace ignition

That way the aliases will automatically be carried over into future versions of the plugin without needing to change any code.
